short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inform you if you're working on the live, staging or local website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
As a WebDeveloper sometimes I loose myself asking if I'm making the changes on live or staging environments.
Don't face this anymore, click on the extension icon, select the environment of the current URL and save.
After refreshing the page (and on the next times) you will see an useful helper text on top right screen.
